xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/1015030-Breaking the Silence: Gay Youth in an American Town 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6Th1dCOhY6x31RRrqJM2A0L7LVB.jpg In a conservative American town where the prevailing opinion is that a gay crisis has been 'invented' by the liberal media, gay youth like 17-year-old Julio, an ex-Mormon who has attempted suicide, must face indifferent school officials and their own shame as they begin to break the silence surrounding LGBT issues. Breaking the Silence: Gay Youth in an American Town
